title: (x) "Da Kidd - Vinnie Da Don" script and serif face - Sofia Script, (similar to) Antique Half Block {Yves}
content:
Thanks in advance!

author: printninja

comments.content: ... and "Vinni Da Don" is similar to [Antique Half Block](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019111258/http:/www.letterheadfonts.com/fonts/antiquehalfblock.shtml), but da type is not heavy enough and da serifs are too small.
